example.name: malinger-v
example.text: However, I-1 do not wish *PRO*-1 to malinger here with my heavy baggage of complaint when I have in fact accepted the fate of my trade, and have supplemented my own joy by peddling texts to keep solvent.
example.arg: with my heavy baggage of complaint

example.name: malingering-n
example.text: Demps responded by physically removing himself from the plantation, which confirmed his malingering in Barrow's mind.
